title: 'We are ready to talk': US news anchor Savannah Guthrie pleads for return of her abducted mother
summary_full: "She is without any medicine. She needs it to survive," says the NBC host about missing 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie.
summary_public: "She is without any medicine. She needs it to survive," says the NBC host about missing 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie.
